definition[0]: a house or apartment that you own as well as your main home and which you use, for example, for holidays
example[0]: town-dwellers who buy second homes in the countryside
definition[1]: a place where you spend a large amount of time but which is not where you live
example[1]: I love Italy. Itâ€™s my second home.
example[2]: From then on, the hospital became my second home.
